title: Information regarding clubs..
content: Im a first year student studying ece in pes(rr) and interested to join clubs. Which are the best technical and entertainment clubs i can be a part of?

comments.body: You can check [clubs.pes.edu](http://clubs.pes.edu) for a list of clubs, however that site is mostly outdated.
This clubs are limited to B. Tech only or MCA students can also join?

donno, ask around in ECC, I think terpschire is there
